candidates.description: Means a candidate who is part of Database but not associated with any PRC. This will be basically someone who was added in some PRC but was neither rejected nor selected, they were never interviewed. Once PRC gets closed, all such candidates added in that PRC will become Active.
Means a candidate who is added under a PRC- yet not under any review.
Means a candidate for whom request has been sent to panel for shortlisting or rejecting the CV.
Means resume of candidate has been shortlisted by panel for Interview after review of CV
Means resume of candidate has been rejected by panel for Interview after review of CV
Means candidate has been aligned for an Interview with panel
Means candidate has been rejected by Interviewer after Interview
Means candidate has been selected by Interviewer after Interview
Means candidate has been shortlisted by Interviewer after Interview but not yet selected. They are different from “Active”, they were interviewed but yet not selected.
This will mean that offer has been extended by HR, but the offer is yet to be approved from management.
Means candidate is under Offer from Organization. This will mean that offer has been approved by management, but the candidate has yet not accepted or rejected it.
Means candidates has accepted the offer and he/she is under offer.
Means candidate is has rejected or declined the offer letter
Means candidate is not Joining after accepting the offer letter.
Means candidate has Joined the organization..
Means candidate was line up for Interview but he/she has nor attended the Interview and not responding to calls after being a “no-show”.
